metadata.title: CVE-2022-3625 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel. It has been classified ascritical. This affects the function devlink_param_set/devlink_param_get ofthe file net/core/devlink.c of the component IPsec. The manipulation leadsto use after free. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue.The identifier VDB-211929 was assigned to this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3625` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic - 5.19.0-21.21
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic-64k - 5.19.0-21.21
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-kvm - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1009-aws - 5.19.0-1009.9
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-azure - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1007-lowlatency - 5.19.0-1007.7

No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-oracle - 5.19.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-1004-raspi - 5.19.0-1004.10
linux-image-5.19.0-1004-raspi-nolpae - 5.19.0-1004.10
No subscription required

linux-image-5.19.0-1003-starfive - 5.19.0-1003.4
No subscription required
